name: BLAST MINER (itch) (SuperGamersGames)
description:
You love explosions. I love explosions. Miners love explosions. Moles don't, but who cares about them, am I right?

Gameplay

Explode the stone and get orbs. Power up the portal and go DEEPER into the caves!

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys = Move

Left Mouse Button = Shoot
